basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Marc Wagner. I retired 2 years ago from the US Army and since then have been a project manager for a construction testing and inspection company. I am a software developer because I enjoy problem-solving. I specifically chose this field because it allows me to learn new things, always presents a challenge, and I will be able to grow professionally. I am hoping to find a role in an environment where I can work with a small team and see projects from start to finish. I have a lot of soft-skills leaders need to be effective; gained from years of managing and training increasingly larger groups. Thank you.

projects.title: Trivia Trebek
projects.description: This was the final project for my 201 course that covered HTML, CSS and Javascript.  Modeled after the gameshow Jeopardy, this is a quiz to help students in that course prepare for their final exam by asking basic questions of those three topics.

projects.title: Horned Beast
projects.description: This project was a series of lab work of using React for the first time.

experience.title: Project Manager
technologies: Compiled bids to compete for construction material testing and inspection contracts

experience.title: Department Manager
technologies: Oversaw and trained 6 supervisors in a section of 65 personnel in day-to-day operations,
personal and professional development, regulatory compliance, and problem solving.
